imdb.plot outline: The Mayo Clinic and Gaiam offer an integrated health action plan combining integrative therapies, a heart healthy sustainable diet, gentle yoga to improve circulation and release tension, stress-relieving guided meditation, and easy practical lifestyle tips. Changing the way you live can change the health of your heart.
imdb.title: Gaiam: Mayo Clinic Wellness Solutions for Heart Health
plot: The Mayo Clinic and Gaiam offer an integrated health action plan combining integrative therapies, a heart healthy sustainable diet, gentle yoga to improve circulation and release tension, stress-relieving guided meditation, and easy practical lifestyle tips. Changing the way you live can change the health of your heart.
